oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Autogenous Vaccines in the Prevention and Control of Mastitis: (Herd Specific and Antibiotic Free Solutions)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wade, Harold Jody
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vaccine manufacturers
mastitis
strain variations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Even though vaccine manufacturers are making great advances in vaccines every year, many long-known mastitis-causing enemies of the dairy industry still cause great problems for veterinarians and producers alike. Mastitis is probably one of the most frustrating diseases to treat especially with new strain variations emerging year to year.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 181
